text: Sungurlare Municipality (, ) is a municipality in Burgas Province, Bulgaria. It includes the town of Sungurlare and a number of villages with a total population of 12,559 as of 2011. ==Demographics== === Religion === According to the latest Bulgarian census of 2011, the religious composition, among those who answered the optional question on religious identification, was the following: == Settlements == Sungurlare Municipality incorporates the following 28 settlements: {| | valign="top" | * Sungurlare * Beronovo * Bosilkovo * Vedrovo * Vezenkovo * Velislav * Valchin * Gorovo * Grozden * Dabovitsa * Esen * Zavet | valign="top" | * Kamchia * Klimash * Kosten * Lozarevo * Lozitsa * Manolich * Podvis * Prilep * Pchelin * Sadovo * Skala * Slavyantsi | valign="top" | * Saedinenie * Terziysko * Chernitsa * Chubra |} == References == ==External links== Category:Municipalities in Burgas Province
title: Sungurlare Municipality
